name: Adoption KPIs
description: Track morning brief opens, acknowledgement times, and assistant vs manual action rates to measure user adoption.

prd.problemStatement: Understanding product adoption requires tracking how users engage with key features. Adoption KPIs reveal usage patterns and areas for improvement.
userStories: As a product manager, I want adoption KPIs so that I can measure feature usage
As an admin, I want to see acknowledgement times so that I can identify training needs
